name: In the face of Danger
description:
This game was made for the 17th ScoreSpace Jam.

The theme was PROTECT.

So you play a little spaceship and must protect an objective rolling through space.

Shoot meteorites and obstacles, don't forget to fix the objective if it breaks down.

The pixel art is quite awful because I made it myself but I had fun and I hope you do as well !

Thanks for reading :)
